features: 【Adjustable & Comfortable Fit】These headphones kids are lightweight and have adjustable headbands which are perfect for kids/children and adults. The soft earmuffs on both sides provide you comfort for long wearing.

【Easy to Control】Nivava K16 Over ear headphones kids are designed with a microphone, the multifunctional button on the headphone cord allows you to answer/hang up calls, and play/pause. And the 3.5mm headphone jack can be compatible with Chromebook Amazon Kindle Tablet Laptop PC MP3/MP4 etc.

【Tangle-free & Nylon Braided Cord 】These kids headphones with premium 4.9ft (1.5m) nylon braided cord which would not tangle or kink. And the 3.5mm headphone jack can be compatible with Chromebook Amazon Kindle Tablet Laptop etc.
【Foldable & Portable Design】The lightweight and foldable feature makes these wired headphones easy to pack into the bag for storage for carrying to travel or storage in the bag.

Support】24 months Hassle-Free limited warranty and quick response customer service, if you have any questions while using, please contact our Customer Service via Amazon email or through the contact information on the instructions. We're dedicated to your satisfaction.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Nivava K16 kid wired foldable lightweight stereo over ear headphones can give you the stereo bass headphones a great sound effect. Take it on your ears can be very comfortable. The 3.5mm universal compatible can fit with computers, cell phones, laptops, MP3/4, CD players, and other3.5mm AUX interface devices. 1. Comfortable Making premium memory foam ear cushions give you comfortability. 2. Foldable and Lightweight The lightweight and foldable design help you take it to anywhere you like and is easy to store. 3. Durable The nylon material of the brained cord can prevent tangling when you use it. Having survived the drop test, stretch tests etc. 4. Great Sound Stereo bass headphones can give you excellent sound.

Frequently Asked Questions: Q: Does it can be used with Kindle and Chromebook? A: Yes, it can work with iPad, computers, cell phones, laptops, PCs, Kindle, CD players, MP3/4, tablets, and other devices that have a standard 3.5 mm audio jack. Q: Do these headphones have a mic? A: Yes, these children's headphones have a microphone that you can use it on online learning or play games with your friend. Q: What age of the children is suitable for these headphones? A: It can fit kids ages 5 and up. The headband size can be adjusted, so it will also fit some adults. Q: Are these easily foldable and do the cords get damaged with folding? A: These fold up very easily and there is plenty of slack in the wire so that folding doesn't damage it. Q: What type of material does the power cord made of? A: It's covered in braided fabric. Very durable! Q: Can these headphones use on airplanes? A: Yes, the lightweight feature that you can carry on airplanes to use, the sound from the headphone will be appropriate to block out the noise on an airplane. Q: Are these easily foldable & lightweight? A: Yes, it folds up easily and is lightweight enough to carry outside. Q: How long is the headphones cord? A: The long nylon braided cable cord is 4.9 feet(1.5m).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product for young kids
reviews.reviewText: Bought 3 sets of these headphones for my nephews for Christmas in different colors and they are by far the best headphones for kids ages 8-14. They are noise canceling but my nephews love them especially when they are on their Amazon fire tablets watching YouTube or playing a game. When they have the headphones on playing a game on their Xbox they can also hear and talk to the players. Definitely worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars needed so much!
reviews.reviewText: The NIVAVA K16 Wired Headphones have proven to be an exceptional choice for my kids, offering a delightful blend of comfort, sound quality, and affordability. As a parent who values safe and enjoyable audio experiences for my children, I'm thoroughly impressed with these headphones. Here's why I find them outstanding:1. Comfortable Fit for Kids: These on-ear headphones are designed with children in mind. They feature a comfortable and adjustable headband that fits securely without causing discomfort, even during extended use.2. Vibrant Color Options: The light blue and red color combination not only adds a playful touch but also makes the headphones visually appealing to kids. It's a design that children find attractive and fun.3. Excellent Sound Quality: Despite being kid-friendly, these headphones deliver impressive sound quality with clear, crisp audio and deep bass. Whether my kids are enjoying music, audiobooks, or educational content, the audio experience is top-notch.4. Built-In Microphone: The integrated microphone allows my children to use these headphones for online classes, video calls, or gaming. The microphone quality is reliable, ensuring that their voices are heard clearly.5. Durable and Foldable Design: The headphones are built to withstand the wear and tear of active kids. They're foldable, making them easy to store and transport. The materials used are sturdy and designed to last.6. Universal Compatibility: These headphones are equipped with a 3.5mm audio jack, making them compatible with a wide range of devices such as Amazon Kindle, Fire, Chromebook, tablets, and more. They're versatile for various media consumption needs.7. Volume Limitation: As a parent, I appreciate the built-in volume limitation feature that helps protect my kids' hearing. It ensures that the audio never reaches harmful levels, promoting safe listening habits.8. Tangle-Free Cable: The cable design minimizes tangling, reducing frustration for both parents and kids. It's a small but thoughtful detail that adds to the overall convenience.9. Affordable Price: The NIVAVA K16 Wired Headphones offer exceptional value for the quality and features they provide. They are budget-friendly without compromising on performance or safety.In conclusion, the NIVAVA K16 Wired Headphones are a fantastic choice for parents looking to provide their children with a safe and enjoyable audio experience. These headphones strike the perfect balance between comfort, sound quality, and affordability. My kids love them, and I appreciate the peace of mind knowing that their hearing is protected with the volume limitation feature. Whether it's for school, entertainment, or communication, these headphones have become an essential part of our family's tech gear. I highly recommend the NIVAVA K16 Wired Headphones to parents seeking reliable and kid-friendly audio solutions that don't break the bank. They're a hit in our household, and I'm sure they'll be in yours too!
